name: Forbidden Growth
description:
Forbidden Growth is a short but sweet 2D Platformer that focuses on quick reactions in order to survive.  Thank you so much for playing!  If you have any constructive criticism, please leave it in the comments so I can use it for my future games.

WARNING: Please Play In Fullscreen Mode!

ACCESSIBILITY: WASD and SPACE can be used as a substitute control method for ARROW KEYS and X if needed.

This game fits the theme of “less is more” for two reasons. The first reason is that I wanted to create a feeling of an empty field with nothing in it into a battlefield full of dangerous mines that only appear when you step on them.  Also, the theme fits when highlighting when a tiny bag of seeds attempts to become a beautiful flower. The seeds start at less but are able to become more upon game completion.

This game was made for Blackthornprod GAME JAM #3
